result.title: Earnix Integrates Verisk's ISO ERC to Accelerate Adoption for Commercial Market Lines
result.text: BOSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Earnix, the leader in Dynamic AI for driving Intelligent Decisioning in the insurance and banking industries, today announced a new integration with Verisk that integrates Earnix's enterprise pricing & rating engine, Price-It, with Verisk's ISO Electronic Rating Content (ISO ERC). result.title: Verisk Analytics: Improving, Not Yet Compelling After Another Deal And Pullback
result.text: Verisk Analytics' shares have dropped 20% since July, improving valuation but still trading at a premium. The company remains a highly focused, profitable data analytics provider for the insurance industry, with EBITDA margins above 50% and near-100% retention rates. The recent $2.35 billion acquisition of AccuLynx adds growth potential but increases leverage and is taking place at a high sales multiple.

result.title: Why Verisk Analytics Stock Plummeted by Over 10% Today

result.title: Verisk to Announce Fiscal Third-Quarter 2025 Results on October 29, 2025
result.text: JERSEY CITY, N.J., Oct. 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verisk (Nasdaq: VRSK), a leading strategic data analytics and technology partner to the global insurance industry, will report its financial results for the fiscal third quarter ended September 30, 2025, on Wednesday, October 29, 2025, before the market open. The press release, with accompanying financial information, will be posted on the Verisk investor website at http://investor.verisk.com.

result.title: ServiceTitan and Verisk Team Up to Bring Xactimate to New Roofing and Exterior Contractors
result.text: LOS ANGELES, Sept. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ServiceTitan (Nasdaq: TTAN), the software platform that powers the trades, is announcing a new collaboration with Verisk (Nasdaq: VRSK), a leading data analytics and technology provider to the global insurance industry, to connect Verisk's Xactimate  solution for property claims management with the ServiceTitan platform.
